original: shes rab zil gyis mi non pa /

analyzed: stobs rnams la brdzi ba med pa /

original: sems can thams cad kyi ston pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi ston pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yab /

original: 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams kyi rgyal po /

original: ye shes dpag tu med pa /
analyzed: ye shes dpag tu med pa /

original: spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
analyzed: spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa /

original: gsung rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gsung rnam par dag pa /
translated: His speech is pure.

original: dbyangs snyan pa /
analyzed: dbyangs snyan pa /

original: sku byad lta bas chog mi shes pa /
analyzed: sku byad lta bas chog mi shes pa /

original: sku mtshungs @131a *//üîΩpa med pa /

original: 'dod pa dag gis ma gos pa /
analyzed: 'dod pa dag gis ma gos pa /

original: gzugs dag gis nye bar ma gos pa /
analyzed: gzugs dag gis nye bar ma gos pa /

original: gzugs med pa dag dang ma 'dres pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa dag dang ma 'dres pa /

original: sdug bsngal las rnam par grol ba phung po dag las rab tu rnam par grol pa /
analyzed: sdug bsngal las rnam par grol ba phung po dag las rab tu rnam par grol pa /

analyzed: khams rnams dang mi ldan pa /

original: skye mched rnams bsdams pa /
analyzed: skye mched rnams bsdams pa /

original: mdud pa rnams shin tu bcad pa /
analyzed: mdud pa rnams shin tu bcad pa /

original: sred pa las shin tu grol ba /
analyzed: sred pa las shin tu grol ba /

original: chu bo las brgal ba /
analyzed: chu bo las brgal ba /

original: ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa /

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes la gnas pa /

original: sems can thams cad la gzigs pa'i sa la bzhugs pa ste /
